Happy 28th Birthday Babe!

A Challenge

You turn 28th today and we know what that means: you are only getting further away from your peak gaming skillz.


I know how much you want to play game together, so for your birthday, I built you one! I hope you can beat it.

Kanye's Crypto Catch

Note: Kanye was not harmed in the production of this game.

Credits and Support
